title: House For Sale In Piliyandala
details:
Brand new house for sale in piliyandala batakattara road
- 3 bedrooms
- 2 bathrooms
- Servant toilet
- Garden
- Car porch
- Fully tiled
- Roller door
- Wooden Pantry
- Fully completed house
- House size: 2300 sqft
- Land size: 6.5 perches
- Located in a tranquil and safe neighborhood.
